biotools.summary: Given nucleosome genomic coordinates, ligation junctions (in pairs format) produced by the Pairtools program, the inucs command line tool identifies interactions falling into different nucleosomes and counts them.

bioschemas.name: iNucs
bioschemas.summary: Given nucleosome genomic coordinates, ligation junctions (in pairs format) produced by the Pairtools program, the inucs command line tool identifies interactions falling into different nucleosomes and counts them.
